title: Thirsty land
creator_credit: Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, World Food Program and Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
brief_description: Describes the search for water in the deserts of Jordan, and other UN assisted works - the training of the Bedouin in farming techniques, the reclamation of land, irrigation, improvement of communications and reafforestation.
